message:
‎"Now that the precedent has been set to employ drones over non-combat areas... Drone expert, P.W. Singer... said, 'At this point, it doesn’t really matter if you are against the technology, because it’s coming.' According to Singer, '...You can use these things anywhere, put them anyplace & the target will never even know they’re being watched."'

http://dprogram.net/2011/02/21/how-close-are-we-to-a-nano-based-surveillance-state/
